# WKSelectionGranularity.character

**Case**

Granularity that allows the user to place selection endpoints at any character boundary.

## Declaration

```swift
case character
```

## Getting the Granularity Options

- **WKSelectionGranularity.dynamic**: Granularity that varies automatically depending on the selection.
